message.content:
I need to identify the line item in the income statement that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

This is the definition of depreciation in accounting - the process of allocating the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a specific line item labeled "Depreciation" with an amount of 91509.94 on 2024-02-01.

This is exactly what I'm looking for - the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91509.94'} }
```
